mapper.select: SELECT ss.student_id, sub_year, semester, AVG(grade_value) AS avg_grade FROM cu_stu_sub AS ss JOIN cu_grade AS g ON ss.grade = g.grade JOIN cu_subject AS s ON ss.subject_id = s.id WHERE sub_year = #{subYear} AND semester = #{semester} AND ss.student_id = #{studentId} GROUP BY student_id;
